segments.text: Excuse me . Do you mind telling me the time when the recruitment will officially start ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It will be held on October 15th .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Should I arrive early or on time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You'd better be early in case that you may be late because of traffic jam . That will put you in a insurmountable place .
segments.speaker: S2
